Checkpoint - Class in <Unnamed>
The Checkpoint class represents a checkpoint which the hero can activate to respawn to.
Checkpoint(PImage, PImage, int, int) - Constructor for class Checkpoint
Creates a new instance of a Checkpoint object having its left corner at the inputed (x, y) coordinates with a specified width and height.
CHECKPOINT_HEIGHT - Static variable in class Checkpoint
 
CHECKPOINT_WIDTH - Static variable in class Checkpoint
 
Circle - Class in <Unnamed>
The Circle class represents a double precision Circle.
Circle() - Constructor for class Circle
Creates a default instance of a Circle object with all dimensions set to zero.
Circle(double, double, double) - Constructor for class Circle
Creates a new instance of a Circle object having a diameter equal to the inputed extent with the center of the Circle at (x, y).
currTime - Static variable in class GameScreen
